amendment.description: Amendment changes language concerning the criteria institutions of higher education must follow in demonstrating a history and continuing practice of program expansion for members of the underrepresentated sex with respect to gender equity in order to use funds available from the Department's Office of Civil Rights.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 129 in the Congressional Record of August 2, 1995, to reduce by $2 million the funds appropriated in the bill for Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972, regarding gender equity in intercollegiate athletic programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastert amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
